name: Spoon by Spoon
description:
Improve your life using the principles of Spoon Theory. Getting better, day by day, spoon by spoon.

Complete various tasks and minigames to increase your available spoons. And when all your chores are done, and you've reached 10 spoons, it's time to celebrate!

Controls:
- Click on the buttons to perform tasks
- Double-tap escape to exit the game

Created for the MinnHax game jam.

Created by:
- Art by BiscuitsWithDavey
- Music & SFX by GodsGarage
- Code & Additional Art by Rapatika
- Code by Stevo

Thank you for playing!
